markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Share Thoughts](/Feats.aspx?ID=977) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 26 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Mualijae ethnicity, Ilverani ethnicity, or Vourinoi ethnicity

</column>

---

You have an uncanny knack of communicating with other elves without speaking, though this habit that is often uncomfortable to observers. You can cast [_mindlink_](/Spells.aspx?ID=195) as an innate occult spell once per day, but you can target only other elves or half-elves.

<title level="2">Share Thoughts leads to...</title>
[Sense Thoughts](/Feats.aspx?ID=985)
name: Share Thoughts
prerequisite: Mualijae ethnicity, Ilverani ethnicity, or Vourinoi ethnicity
prerequisite_markdown: Mualijae ethnicity, Ilverani ethnicity, or Vourinoi ethnicity
